GoingViral

This site was developed to give people easy access to published data regarding
the COVID-19 pandemic. The data is taken from the 'Coronavirus Api initiative'
which crawls state government websites for the information. As state governments
update their data, the graph below will reflect those changes. Please, mouse-over
the graph to observe additional data within a tooltip.

Author: Edward Garrett
